subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rookies Kyle Turris and Mikkel Boedker each scored for the first time in the N.H.L., and Ilya Bryzgalov made 34 saves against his former Anaheim teammates to lead the Phoenix Coyotes to a 4-2 victory that spoiled the Ducks’ home opener.
snippet: The rookies Kyle Turris and Mikkel Boedker each scored for the first time in the N.H.L., and Ilya Bryzgalov made 34 saves against his former Anaheim teammates to lead the Phoenix Coyotes to a 4-2 victory that spoiled the Ducks’ home opener.
